description: Gets information about the specified fleet metric. Requires permission to access the DescribeFleetMetric action.

parameters.name: metricName
parameters.description: The name of the fleet metric to describe.

nested_items.name: metricName
nested_items.description: The name of the fleet metric to describe.

nested_items.name: aggregationType
nested_items.description: The type of the aggregation query.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the aggregation type.

nested_items.name: values
nested_items.description: A list of the values of aggregation types.

nested_items.name: period
nested_items.description: The time in seconds between fleet metric emissions. Range [60(1 min), 86400(1 day)] and must be multiple of 60.

nested_items.name: indexName
nested_items.description: The name of the index to search.

nested_items.name: creationDate
nested_items.description: The date when the fleet metric is created.

nested_items.name: lastModifiedDate
nested_items.description: The date when the fleet metric is last modified.

nested_items.name: unit
nested_items.description: Used to support unit transformation such as milliseconds to seconds. The unit must be supported by CW metric.

nested_items.name: version
nested_items.description: The version of the fleet metric.

nested_items.name: metricArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the fleet metric to describe.
